name: English Language Arts
notes: 4 units. Must include English 2 (EOCEP). Can be English 1–4, AP English, or approved Dual Enrollment.

name: Mathematics
notes: 4 units. Algebra 1 (or Intermediate Algebra) requires an EOCEP.

name: Natural Science
notes: 3 units. Must include Biology 1 (EOCEP). Colleges often recommend 3 lab sciences.

name: Other Social Studies
notes: Other SS credit not already counted as US/GOV/ECON (e.g., World History, Geography, APHUG, etc.).

name: Physical Education
notes: 1 unit of PE. (If you want JROTC to satisfy this too, make sure JROTC courses also include PE_CREDIT in their course req list.)

name: Health
notes: If required separately; some programs (ex: JROTC) may cover health/CPR/AED depending on your local rules.

name: World Language or CATE
notes: SC grad: 1 unit World Language OR CATE. Many colleges want 2–3 units same language.

name: General Electives
notes: Extra credits can roll into electives. Adjust to hit 24 total credits (often 7.0 for older cohorts).
